node.title: This week on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan," March 27, 2022
node.description: Illinois Republican Congressman Adam Kinzinger, Former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine Marie Yovanovitch, and more appear this Sunday on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan"
node.content: ["David Martin -\u00a0CBS News National Security Correspondent", "Date:\u00a0Sunday, March 27, 2022", "TV:\u00a0\"Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan\" airs Sunday mornings on CBS. Click\u00a0here\u00a0for your local listings", "Radio:\u00a0Subscribe\u00a0to \"Face the Nation\" from CBS News Radio to listen on-the-go", "Free online stream:\u00a0Watch the show\u00a0on CBS' 24/7 streaming news service CBSN\u00a0at 10:30 a.m., 1 p.m. and 4 p.m. ET.", "With the latest news and analysis from Washington, don't miss Margaret Brennan (@margbrennan) this Sunday on \"Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan\"", "And for the latest from America's premier public affairs program, follow us on\u00a0Facebook,\u00a0Twitter\u00a0and\u00a0Instagram.."]
